about: Convert sunlight directly into electricity using solar panels made of semiconductor materials like silicon. It include solar panels, a solar inverter, mounting, cabling.
Use mirrors or lenses to concentrate sunlight to generate heat, which can be used for heating, cooling etc. It  is also used to store a solar energy in  fluid in two tanks.
Large-scale systems that concentrate solar energy to produce steam for powering turbines in a solar power. It use mirrored dishes to focus sunlight on a receiver.
